text: Ate amalam di pauthi (khola de) rakhi javegi tam tusim aparadhi'am nu dekhoge ki usa vica jo kujha hai, uha usa tom darade honage ate kahinage ki ha'e vinasa! Kiho jihi hai amalam di pauthi ki isa ne na ko'i choti gala varaja karani chadi ate na vadi gala. Ate jihare karama unham ne kita, uha sabha sahamane vekhanage ate tera raba kise upara ko'i zulama nahim karega
